insert into t_product_in_aftersale ( id, groupid, amazonauthid, marketplaceid,sku, date, quantity) values
(uuid_short(), #{stm.groupid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stm.amazonauthid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stm.marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stm.sku,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stm.date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stm.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m') m,'needship' ftype,SUM(quantity) qty from t_product_in_aftersale a LEFT JOIN t_amazon_group g ON g.id=a.groupid WHERE `date` >= CONCAT (DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m'),'-01') AND `date` < CONCAT (DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 4 MONTH), '%Y-%m'),'-01') AND g.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.groupid=#{groupid,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m') UNION all SELECT DATE_FORMAT(s.status5date, '%Y-%m') m,'hasship' ftype,SUM(i.QuantityShipped) qty FROM t_erp_ship_inbounditem i LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inboundshipment s ON s.ShipmentId=i.ShipmentId LEFT JOIN t_erp_ship_inboundplan p ON p.id=s.inboundplanid WHERE p.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and p.amazongroupid=#{groupid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND s.`status`>=5 AND s.status5date>=CONCAT (DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -3 MONTH), '%Y-%m'),'-01') AND s.status5date < CONCAT (DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m'),'-01') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(s.status5date, '%Y-%m')

select * from ( SELECT a.sku, m.name, g.name groupname, IFNULL(p.location,p.url) image, case when a.marketplaceid='EU' then '欧洲' ELSE mk.name END marketname
, SUM(case when DATE_FORMAT(`date`, '%Y-%m') =#{fieldmap,jdbcType=CHAR} then quantity ELSE 0 END ) `${fieldmap}`
from t_product_in_aftersale a LEFT JOIN t_marketplace mk ON mk.marketplaceId=a.marketplaceid LEFT JOIN t_product_info i ON i.sku=a.sku AND i.marketplaceid=case when a.marketplaceid='EU' then 'APJ6JRA9NG5V4' ELSE a.marketplaceid END and i.amazonAuthId=a.amazonauthid LEFT JOIN t_amazon_group g ON g.id=a.groupid LEFT JOIN t_product_in_opt o ON o.pid=i.id LEFT JOIN t_erp_material m ON m.sku=IFNULL(o.msku,i.sku) AND g.shopid=m.shopid AND m.isDelete=0 LEFT JOIN t_picture p ON p.id=i.image WHERE `date`>=CONCAT (DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH), '%Y-%m'),'-01') AND `date`<CONCAT (DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 4 MONTH), '%Y-%m'),'-01') AND g.shopid=#{param.shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND a.groupid=#{param.groupid,jdbcType=CHAR}
and (a.sku like #{param.search,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.name like #{param.search,jdbcType=CHAR} or i.name like #{param.search,jdbcType=CHAR})
GROUP BY a.amazonauthid,a.marketplaceid,a.sku ) v
